overview_of_class:
This course is designed to develop and improve writing skills through a variety of classroom activities:
discussion, writing, editing. Students will learn how to write a college-level analytical paper. Selected grammar points will be discussed in class, and course content will be provided by a novel and two films. Homework will include short writing exercises and compositions as well as the preparation of grammar exercises related to the writing objectives. This course serves as prerequisite for most other 200 and 300-level French classes.
name: Writing Workshop
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: FRENCH
